text: Sultan Ali Keshtmand (; born May 22, 1935), sometimes transliterated Kishtmand, was an Afghan politician. He was the Chairman of the Council of Ministers twice during the 1980s, from 1981 to 1988 and from 1989 to 1990 in the Democratic Republic of Afghanistan. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Afghanistan Category:Prime ministers of Afghanistan Category:20th-century Afghan people
title: Sultan Ali Keshtmand
